vision.notes: Anglerfish family, found at varying depths. Vision likely plays a role, though potentially adapted for low-light conditions in deep-sea species. Needs further research.

mechanoreception.notes: Given their benthic lifestyle, mechanoreception is likely important for detecting prey and navigating the seafloor. Further research needed to determine the specific mechanisms.

chemoreception.notes: Chemoreception likely plays a role in locating prey in the deep sea.
